content: > this pattern is available for **free** on > my website click the link above **skill level easy** **measurements ** width = 12 30 cm length = 47 120 cm approx **size customization ** you can make the size bigger by repeating the general pattern more than what is mentioned in the instructions **materials ** * suggested yarn tunc star maxi 100% acrylic 3 53 oz 100 g 328 yards 300 m in the color 3044 1 skein * circular knitting needles 32 80 cm size us 7 4 5 mm * tapestry needle * ring stitch marker
